trans-unit.source: Represents a collection of script references to combine into a single composite script.
The number of script references that a CompositeScriptReference instance can contain is limited by the size of the resulting URL.
The URL cannot be longer than 1024 characters.
If you have to work around this limitation, you have two options.
The first option is to reduce the number of <xref:System.Web.UI.ScriptReference> objects that the composite script contains.
The second option is to manually combine the scripts into a single static file.
In that case, you can set the <xref:System.Web.UI.ScriptReferenceBase.Path%2A> property to the location of the static file.
Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Web.UI.CompositeScriptReference"></xref> class.

Returns the URL that is rendered as the value of the <xref uid="langword_csharp_src" name="src" href=""></xref> attribute of the <xref uid="langword_csharp_script" name="script" href=""></xref> element.
The <xref uid="langword_csharp_ScriptManager" name="ScriptManager" href=""></xref> control on the target Web page.
<xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> to compress the script; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
A string that contains a URL.
Determines whether the composite script is a reference to an ASP.NET AJAX framework script.
The <xref href="System.Web.UI.ScriptManager"></xref> object that is contained on the page.

<xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the composite script is a reference to an ASP.NET AJAX framework script; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
Indicates whether the composite script contains a reference to an ASP.NET AJAX framework script.

<xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the composite script contains a reference to an ASP.NET AJAX framework script; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
Gets a collection of script references that are contained in the composite script object.
A collection of script references that are contained in the composite script object.
